channel.title: Authors on LegitDAO: a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) building the necessary tools to develop an artificial general intelligence (AGI)
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on LegitDAO: a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) building the necessary tools to develop an artificial general intelligence (AGI)

item.title: Steve Rodrigue
item.description: Steve Rodrigue is a seasoned software engineer with over 25 years of experience in diverse fields, including video game development, web design, fintech products, AI modeling, and smart contracts. Throughout his career, he has combined his professional skills with personal projects, continually pushing the boundaries of technology.
